828198a8-d606-4e66-8d1d-ed8cee4cc53e.title: Heroes of Might and Magic 3
828198a8-d606-4e66-8d1d-ed8cee4cc53e.summary:
In 2022, Archon Games announced that they were creating a board game based on Heroes of Might and Magic III.[47] The game involves deckbuilding, combat units, and economic management.[48] Each play session will have a different goal, with maps generated by placing tiles in a dynamic way.[49]

The Kickstarter campaign received more than US$2 million in its first week,[50] and reached 2.6 million pounds in its final week, or 6000% of its Â£43,000 funding goal
